form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Baucus(for himself andMr. Hatch) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the special rule for contributions of qualified conservation contributions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Heritage Conservation Extension Act of 2013 .

section.header: Special rule for contributions of qualified conservation contributions made permanent

paragraph.text: Subparagraph (E) ofsection 170(b)(1)of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended by theAmerican Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012, is amended by strikingclause (vi).
Subparagraph (B) of section 170(b)(2) of such Code, as amended by theAmerican Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012, is amended by strikingclause (iii).

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to contributions made in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013.

section.header: Elimination of charitable deduction for easements on golf courses

subsection.text: Section 170(h)of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Exception for easements for golf courses
paragraph.text: For purposes of this section, the termqualified conservation contributionshall not include any contribution of an easement for use on, or intended for use on, a golf course.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to contributions made after the date of the enactment of this Act.
